response.overview: I've been studying your race for a very long time. Observing you from here... I know that you still have a lot to learn. Still, I'm jealous of your power. Even though you're not aware of  it. You believe you are millions, each on their own. But your emotions are connecting you to one another. One single tear makes many of you sad. One single smile makes many others happy. Behind a screen or in real life, it doesn't matter. One emotion is enough to connect you. You create your own strength to fight. You create and destroy with your emotions. Time and space change in front of your power. Emotions slow down time... Emotions speed it up. Emotions make distances shorter. Thank you, because while watching you from up here, I can understand how WE ARE ONE.
response.title: ALIEN: We are ONE
